headline: Epstein Abused Girls on Island Until 2018, Suit Says
abstract: The attorney general of the Virgin Islands says Mr. Epstein and his associates used a database to track victims as young as 11 years old.
lead_paragraph: New evidence shows Jeffrey Epstein sexually abused and trafficked hundreds of young women and girls on his private Caribbean island, some as recently as 2018, significantly expanding the scope of his alleged conduct, a top law enforcement official said in a lawsuit filed on Wednesday.
